column.name: content
column.value:
@@@import:resourcetype@@@ Booking


Book Online
Book a resource for a period of time.
(Login before you book.)



Manage My Bookings
Login and manage your bookings. View your past and future bookings. Cancel bookings or add a comment to one of your bookings.



Booking Administration
Login and manage all bookings. View availability for individual resources and resource categories. Search for bookings.

Login and manage your bookings. View your past and future bookings. Cancel bookings or add a comment to one of your bookings.



Booking Administration
Login and manage all bookings. View availability for individual resources and resource categories. Search for bookings.
